short_info: The City View Twin Rooms offer elegant residential grace, four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views. These rooms feature 350 square feet and are situated on floors 5 to 21.
service_amenities:
Service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 5 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
room_features:
Room Features

The City View Twin Rooms offer elegant residential grace, four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views. These rooms feature 350 square feet and are situated on floors 5 to 21.

Bed & Bath Experience

The City View Rooms are spacious and feature comfortable two twin beds with unparalleled views of Manhattan’s iconic skyline. The room also features a nightstand, Bose Wave studio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock and an executive writing desk and chair. A 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar is located across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
additional-info: Featuring 350 square feet, City View Twin Rooms offer elegant residential grace, four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views. These rooms are situated on floors 5 to 21.
